title: Propulsion Assignment
description: Analyze the performance characteristics of different propulsion systems, focusing on thrust and efficiency.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Perform a detailed analysis of combustion processes in aerospace engines and determine factors affecting fuel efficiency.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Design an efficient nozzle for a rocket engine, considering pressure, velocity, and material constraints.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: A timed quiz covering key concepts of aerodynamics, including lift, drag, and airflow patterns around airfoils.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Analyze airflow over various surfaces and calculate pressure distribution and velocity profiles.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Evaluate thermal loads and heat transfer mechanisms on aerospace structures in high-speed flight.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Design a lightweight, high-strength structural component for a spacecraft, considering material properties and safety factors.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Perform calculations to determine orbital trajectories and parameters for satellite positioning and station-keeping.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: A comprehensive exam on systems engineering principles, covering lifecycle management, integration, and risk assessment in aerospace projects.
